name: mern-stack-starter
description: A MERN stack starter template with TypeScript, Express, React, Better-Auth and MongoDB.
author: Mehmet Enes Turhan

scripts.build: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix backend && npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.dev: npx concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
